entries.source: Chat Edit: 'Can you see if there's a way to change the font color in kitty terminal for the autocomplete text? In the screenshot, most of the fonts are very legible, but at the current prompt, I start typing "a" and autocomplete text appears but it is using dark gray--can you force that to use a lighter color? Kitty is using theme colors and not hard-coded values (I think), just FYI.'
